tool.name: Histogram Matching
tool.description: This tool alters the values of a grid so that its value distribution (its histogram), matches that of a reference grid. The first method simply uses arithmetic mean and standard deviation for adjustment, which usually is sufficient for normal distributed values. The second method performs a more precise adjustment based on the grids' histograms.

param.name: NCLASSES
param.label: Histogramm Classes
param.help: Number of histogram classes for internal use.

param.name: MAXSAMPLES
param.label: Maximum Sample Size
param.help: If set to zero all data will be used to build the histograms.
